Finch Station.name: Finch Station
Finch Station.description: You are starting at Finch station don't be scared to explore other stations aswell. Good luck!

Sheppard Yonge.name: Sheppard Yonge
Sheppard Yonge.description: You are now at Sheppard Yonge, explore the area and see what you can find. If you want to exit left go east. If you want to exit south, you go to York Mills station

SY Area1.name: Sheppard Yonge Area 1
SY Area1.description: You are in Sheppard Yonge area 1. There are no entities however there is a pocket Knife

Items.name: Pocket Knife
Items.description: The pocket knife at Sheppard Yonge station helps you cut things and help open tightly packed stuff. It also helps you kill animals if you do not have access to the sword yet but will deal less damage..

SY Area2.name: Sheppard Yonge Area 2
SY Area2.description: You are in Sheppard Yonge area 2. There is a Grubber NPC but no items

NPC.name: Grubber
NPC.description: A skittish, mutated scavenger obsessed with shiny objects and wires. It’s unfriendly and attacks by leaping and biting if cornered.

SY Area3.name: Sheppard Yonge Area 3
SY Area3.description: You are in Sheppard Yonge area 3. There are no entities of items

Bayview.name: Bayview
Bayview.description: You are at Bayview Station, head west to Leslie or go East

Leslie.name: Leslie
Leslie.description: You are now at Leslie go east to don mills station or west back to Bayview

Don Mills.name: Don Mills
Don Mills.description: You are now at Leslie go east to don mills station or west back to Bayview

NPC.name: Rattle Back
NPC.description: A deranged maintenance mech fused with wreckage and corrupted code, now guarding its key like it's sacred. Unfriendly and aggressive, it slams the ground to trigger shockwaves and charges intruders.

DM Area2.name: Don Mills Area2
DM Area2.description: You are in Don Mills area 2. There are no entities however there is a key

DM Area3.name: Don Mills Area3
DM Area3.description: You are in Don Mills area 3. There is an NPC and a Health Potion

Items.name: Health Potion
Items.description: You have found a health Potion which will add 50 to your health bar. Use it wisely!

York Mills.name: York Mills Station
York Mills.description: You are now at York mills Station. You can explore and find items/ NPC's or head south to Lawrence Station

YM Area 1.name: York Mills Area1
YM Area 1.description: You are at York Mills area 1. There are no entities or NPC's

YM Area 2.name: York Mills area 2
YM Area 2.description: You are at York Mills Area2. There are no NPC's and no items

YM Area3.name: York Mills area 3
YM Area3.description: You are at York Mills Area3. There are no NPC's but there is a key

Items.name: Key2
Items.description: You have found a key. This will help you escape the game. Make sure that you find the 2 others!

YM Area4.name: York Mills area 4
YM Area4.description: You are at York Mills Area4. There are no NPC's but there is a sword

Items.name: Sword
Items.description: The sword in the York mills Station helps you fend off monsters

YM Area5.name: York Mills area 5
YM Area5.description: You are at York Mills Area5. There are no NPC's and no items

Lawrence.name: Lawrence Station
Lawrence.description: You are now at Lawrence Station. You can explore and find items or head south to Eglinton Station

L Area1.name: Lawrence Area1
L Area1.description: You are at Lawrence Area1. There is nothing here

L Area2.name: Lawrence Area2
L Area2.description: You are at Lawrence Area2. There are no items but there is a whisperer NPC

NPC.name: Whisperer
NPC.description: : A cloaked being that speaks only in your own voice, revealing your worst fears. Unfriendly and uses psychic weapons that disorient and drain health.

L Area3.name: Lawrence Area3
L Area3.description: You are at Lawrence Area3. There is no NPC's however there is a corrupted presto card

items.name: Corrupted Presto Card
items.description: You have found a health Potion which will add 50 to your health bar. Use it wisely!

Eglinton.name: Eglinton
Eglinton.description: You are now at Eglinton Station. Do you have the corrupted Presto card for the gate to enter St Clair Station?. If not, head back to previous stations and check for the card

St Clair.name: St Clair
St Clair.description: You are now 9at St Clair Station. You can now head south to Bloor Yonge

Bloor Yonge.name: Bloor Yonge
Bloor Yonge.description: You are now at Bloor Yonge Station. The station is very big and I would recommend you explore because you never know what there is.

BY Area01.name: Bloor Yonge area 01
BY Area01.description: You are at Bloor Yonge Area 01. There are no NPC's and no items

BY Area02.name: Bloor Yonge area 02
BY Area02.description: You are at Bloor Yonge Area 02. There are are no NPC's but an unknown potion

Items.name: Unknown Potion
Items.description: Will randomize that potion that you can acquire

BY Area03.name: Bloor Yonge area 03
BY Area03.description: You are at Bloor Yonge Area 03. There are no items but there is a spindle NPC

NPC.name: Spindle
NPC.description: An intelligent repair drone turned reclusive inventor, building silk-wire webs through the tunnels. Friendly and will restore your health if you complete a task.

BY Area04.name: Bloor Yonge area 04
BY Area04.description: You are at Bloor Yonge Area 04. There are no items or entities

BY Area1.name: Bloor Yonge area 1
BY Area1.description: You are at Bloor Yonge Area 1. There are no NPC's and no items

BY Area2.name: Bloor Yonge area 2
BY Area2.description: You are at Bloor Yonge Area 2. There are no items but there is a trackwalk NPC

NPC.name: Trackwalk
NPC.description: A spectral figure doomed to walk its patrol forever after a failed rescue mission. It’s unfriendly and violently attacks with electrified limbs if anyone blocks its route or approaches the key.

BY Area3.name: Bloor Yonge area 3
BY Area3.description: You are at Bloor Yonge Area 3. There are no entities but there is a Key

NPC.name: Key3
NPC.description: Will randomize that potion that you can acquire

Dundas.name: Dundas
Dundas.description: You are now at Bloor Yonge Station. The station is very big and I would recommend you explore because you never know what there is.

D area1.name: Dundas area1
D area1.description: You are at Dundas area 1.There are no items or entities

D area2.name: Dundas area2
D area2.description: You are at Dundas area 2.There are no items or entities

D area3.name: Dundas area3
D area3.description: You are at Dundas area 2.There are no items but there is a Fireless Prophet

NPC.name: Fireless Prophet
NPC.description: A scorched zealot of the old flame, now preaching cold salvation beneath flickering lights. Unfriendly and casts sparks of static energy through his sword when interrupted.

D area4.name: Dundas area4
D area4.description: You are at Dundas area 4.There are no NPC but there is a Conductor hat

Items.name: Conductor's hat
Items.description: Helps you get past the gate from Dundas and Queen’s station

Queens.name: Queens
Queens.description: You are now at Queen's Station.  There is nothing here, I recommend going to the next station

King.name: King
King.description: You are now at King's Station. There is nothing here, I recommend going to the next station

Union.name: Union
Union.description: You are now at the final station Union. Where you can escape. If you have all 3 keys, you can escape but if not access is denied.

U area1.name: Union Area 1
U area1.description: You are at Union area 1.There are no items or entities

U area2.name: Union Area 2
U area2.description: You are at Union area 2.There are no items but there is a guardian NPC

NPC.name: Guardian NPC
NPC.description: A towering sentinel powered by forgotten cores, awaiting the chosen bearer of the three subway keys. Friendly unless threatened, it opens the escape only to those who prove themselves
